topics.name: The Peach Fall
topics.label: series
topics.tagline: How will you get up again when you descend into the peach fall?

topics.name: The Sore Transition
topics.label: poems
topics.tagline: I take an oath to slowly become the one I ought to be...

stories.name: The Autumn FireBlocks
content: The cold breeze swinging by the window
The spasmodic flow makes me freeze for a while
The rushing of emotions that I once laid behind
A sudden surge of vain keeps me occupied
A war settles in between my heart and my mind
Why do you keep looking back again and again?
Why do you not trust people again?
Underrated feelings that will never go through
I know I can never feel it again like I used to
I know I can never settle for the sake of YOU
How can I live in the fire that I set in?
I gave in too much to get back up
How can I set myself free?
When faux and lust never leaves me
I made promises, you made me break it
I fought for you, you killed me instead
Deep down I know I became weaker
Confronting strangled thoughts every night
You made me like this
But I know you will never even know it
Cuz you never cared, you never said
You could see me burning right in front of your eyes
But you left like you never knew me
I was the only one burning
Shattered into pieces
I know I can never feel it again like I used to
I know I can never settle for the sake of YOU
No, never for YOU
You had your time, you had your charms
Darling, fakes don't last for a lifetime
You stroke me countless times
I survived on
Battling with a beast inside me
I became someone I hated to be the most
I became someone I used to be
Whom you never know
Yeah, no one knows
I know the lives I touch will get better
I know the life I live will never settle
How can I live in the fire that I set in?
How can I set myself free?
The countless mistakes that never leaves me
The battered nights I can never forget
These memories will never heal me
I know I can never feel it again like I used to
I know I will never let me feel even if I want to

stories.name: Insanity
content: Am i going crazy?
My words i cannot express
How am i willing to tell you?
I ask myself
I have been insane
I have been waiting
For you to break my chains
The life i had been living
Was it all my curse? Or was it all my fault?
I was not crazy as they told me
I just wanted you to hold me
I became insane my own life became jail
I set it on fire but still you weren't there
I lived for you and i needed you
I have lost my patience
Just searching for you
I can feel your melody piercing through my heart
I can feel the pain you have fought
Loneliness creeps in as i try to find you
My dusk sets in before i can even see you
So I want you to find me
To send away all my fears
I hope you would find me
To make me feel again

stories.name: Beyond Mars
content: Forced to make a decision
I steered all my life in vain
Jumping into the fire
Trying to excoriate all of my pain
Sold my soul to the reaper
Bruises and seizures made their way
I was told not to scream on the stage
Where i was naked with all of my fears
I never should have been too kind
Wasting my time beyond mars
I fought with my despair
And i got paralyzed
Suffocated air, the reason is you
Beyond mars i keep running fluid

stories.name: Lost Dreams
content: Am i hearing things?
Or is it just me?
I keep dissolving into your melody
The kind that makes me sleep
I hear your secret meanings and i am lost in it
Into my own world of dreams
I wish someone wake me up
But i wonder why do i find peace in it?
The soft wind heals me underneath
As if i am swiftly loving the sea
I see you with your sweetest smile
The kind that makes me heal
Your voice echoing in my ears makes me think
You are just a character in my dream
I wish someone wake me up
But i still wonder why are you my escape to serendipity!

stories.name: Contract
content: Here i am starting a blank slate
To be written in a sane way
I know i have made mistakes
i am trying to start again
Could i be this stronger again?
I set a book on fire
To let it burn and vanish before my eyes
My eyes were crying when i decided to let go
That sight when i promised myself to take care
No, dont stay
Just go away
My miseries, my pain
I gotta let you off today
Go, find a place
Where you can always stay
My miseries, my pain
I will hold it all everyday
There's no reason you should stay
With me, in my veins
No, dont stay
Just go away
I gotta let you off today
I dont want jewels
I dont want cruise
I just wanted to stay in heart
To let me be me again
Is that too cruel?
I set a fire in my heart today
I will never love again
You need my body not my pain
Crumbling in the dark
I picked up some of my pieces again
Who are you to hold me?
Faulty faces all around me
You gotta have some shame
Shattering me into pieces
And you dare to ask me face to face?
What a shame!
I wish i had never met you today
I will bleed, i will shed
I will stand on my heels and say fuck you again and again
I set you on fire
I set you off today
No, dont stay
Just go find a place

stories.name: Forgetting You
content: Seems like it was just a year ago
The time we met in an unexpected way
Its already more a year now
This time i need to let you off the hook
Your memories in me are fading
Like sun setting to let the dark come in
I want to live a life without you
I want no suffer with you and me
Sail your boat and wander
With the ocean tides waving forward
I wish you have a good life
To be without me
I want you to live your life
Without searching me
I will live by with my losing memories
I want to stay aside without care in my heart
That is how i should be, that is how i need to be
Yet i cannot become one i become paranoid like i used to be...
I know i am full of golden touch
Spreading laughters in your life once i leave
This is better, this is how it should be
Leaving me, this is what you should be doing
Dont get touched by my actions
It would only be a hindrance
Its easier to let go of me
Once you learn the dark sides of me
So hot headed, so egoist you will say
I know everyone pictures me this way
That is why i want to live a life without you
I dont want to hear these words from you
Forget me, forget our times
Even when i am not doing it well

stories.name: The Rising Downfall
content: Curtains lift up on the wall
It was no longer that same play in the stage
The floor had a different scent
Plumeria spread across the lane
He was waiting for me in the first row
To begin a new beginning
My downfall was already waiting for me
As I woke up in the scent of Yasmin
Rise and fall, that's how my life had been
Rise and fall, that's how I set my life to be...
The long floral dress, that curly hair
I stood up in the top of the tower full of beasts
Looking for a prince to set me free
Though I already knew the saviour is none other than me
Beasts hunting me down
Fierce breaths eager to eat me up
Down was the prince helpless standing
Watching me fall down on my knees
And then rising up with a pack of my own beasts
He was anxiously waiting for me
And I left him to be swallowed in his fears
I was already a queen of my throne
He was just a prince, coward and unknown
The stage was already on fire as we caught each other's eyes
He was in the audience and I was on the limelight
Reel and real, both persisted within me
I was a queen, also waiting for the prince
I already knew my downfall had started to befall upon me
With just a gaze, I rise and fall at the same pace
His presence impacting the whole universe around me
My downfall was already waiting for me
As I woke up in the scent of Yasmin
Rise and fall, that's how my life had been
Rise and fall, that's how I will save myself again

stories.name: The Healer
content: Dark pale nights, those unknown chilling voices
Thrusting into my head, locked down, I fall down
Casted upon a spell
I tried to break them apart but nothing would gain
Every day it was the same
Fears and doubts pilling up against
The cold chill inside my heart
The concussion over my head
Never ending in a blissful state
I was broken when I heard a soulful song
Healing me red through my blue veins
Scattering those ultrasonic sounds into seven waves
Forged with its painful stories that even destroyed vain
The melody pierced through my skin
Charging me up with its troth
For it was only meant for me
To heal myself and comfort me with its warm soul
Every time I suffocated, I found you as my escape
Antidoting me with your words inside my veins
I held my head high with your comforts again
I shall might rise up in this world of pain
You are my healer
You are my fiend
Will you heal me whenever I ask you not to save me?
Will you set me free whenever I push you off to leave me alone?
I close my eyes and feel you grin
Only to know that you are not real
I save myself in your world where you seal
The broken me inside your black shining wings

stories.name: The Faux Scale
content: I woke up in the night of the fall
Rain tumbling above the ceiling
Just the same as my feelings
I cannot escape this thriller inside my veins
Rumbling along with my heartbeat
Freefall through the unwinding space
I lost my sense
I hear deep voices telling me to wake up
In this notorious world
Where i would be just a pawn of chess
I overflowed with nostalgic films
Reminding me of how tragic it had been
Climax was on with dark shades
A small voice came in to me
Will you be able to live being this heartless?
Reverting into that darkness
I must have been insane somehow
Habits that i threw returned to me
Just like winter after the spring dries out
I know I can never live again
If it comes back for me
I will never see this light again
If it befalls upon me
If I fail to hold on
I can't get out of this
And thats what keeps worrying me
I hide my soul inside the crueliest me
To protect that weak foe
That always tries to kill me
I broke those unfaithful chains of streams
But everytime i do it, i still feel the same
It hurts, it bleeds red bloody stains
Yet nobody will know how the stage was cleared.
At last, it will wither away as an unknown screen.
